caption:
“Faith is rebellion against despair.”

Reflection:
To believe is to defy the darkness. Hope is holy resistance in a weary world.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that faith is not passive — it’s the soul’s uprising against hopelessness. Every prayer is an act of quiet revolution.
